snippet: The French director and physical comedian Pierre Etaix is the subject of a 12-day celebration at Film Forum.
abstract: French director and physical comedian Pierre Etaix is the subject of a 12-day celebration at Film Forum; Etaix is considered one of cinema's finest physical comedians after the silent era, but is relatively unknown even to fans of Charlie Chaplin and Buster Keaton.
lead_paragraph: The French director and physical comedian Pierre Etaix is the subject of a 12-day celebration at Film Forum.

headline.seo: Pierre Étaix Is Honored at Film Forum
headline.main: The Grace, and the Glee, of a Clown
headline.print_headline: The Grace, And the Glee, Of a Clown
